name: Axiom Seymour Oceanweave P13+ Seat Pack
description:
A roomy trunk for your long commute or bike packing tours, made with reclaimed plastics to help reduce waste in our waterways. The roll closure expands or shrinks to perfectly fit the contents, with additional external carry options to clip small items to.Oceanweave® fabric is made with reclaimed fishnets.Water-resistant stitching and a polyurethane coating keep contents dry.Adjustable webbing mounting straps and buckles for a perfect fit.Roll-top and compression straps keep the load nice and tight.Built-in U-lock holder and top bungee storage system.Highly reflective 3M accents and rear light loop enhance visibility.

        Sustainability





.st0{stroke:#333;stroke-width:.79;stroke-miterlimit:10}
